io.janusproject.services.spawn

Interface SpawnService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DependentService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardSpawnService

    public interface SpawnService
extends DependentService
    This service provides the tools to manage the life-cycle of the agents.
    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        UUID spawn(AgentContext parent,
         UUID agentId,
         Class<? extends Agent> agentClazz,
         Object... params)
        Spawn an agent of the given type, and pass the parameters to its initialization function.
        Parameters:
        parent - - the parent entity that is creating the agent.
        agentClazz - - the type of the agent to spawn.
        agentId - - the identifier of the agent to spawn. If null the identifier is randomly selected.
        params - - the list of the parameters to pass to the agent initialization function.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the agent, never null.

      • killAgent

        void killAgent(UUID agentID)
               throws SpawnService.AgentKillException
        Kill the agent with the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        agentID - - the identifier of the agent to kill.
        Throws:
        SpawnService.AgentKillException - - thrown when the agent cannot be killed.

      • addSpawnServiceListener

        void addSpawnServiceListener(UUID id,
                           SpawnServiceListener agentLifecycleListener)
        Add a listener on the changes in the current state of an agent.
        Parameters:
        id - - identifier of the agent.
        agentLifecycleListener - - the listener on the any change in the life-cycle of the agent.
